name: branch
description: Branch name.

name: build_date
description: Date of the given build.

name: build
description: Build number.

name: builtOn
description: Node name.

name: category
description: Category name.

name: duration_days
description: Duration in days.

name: duration_min
description: Duration in minutes.

name: duration
description: Duration in milliseconds.

name: fullDisplayName_analyzed
description: Job's full name analyzed for searching.

name: fullDisplayName
description: Job's full name as a single string for bucketizing if needed.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Date when item was created upstream, i.e. when the job was created.

name: installer
description: Installer name extracted from job's name (text before the first hyphen).

name: is_jenkins_job
description: Field containing '1' that allows to sum fields when concatenating with other indexes.

name: job_build
description: Build's reference, includes job's name and number.

name: job_name
description: Job's name.

name: job_url
description: URL corresponding to the given job.

name: loop
description: Frequency of job's execution.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the data was retrieved from.

name: pod
description: Pod name.

name: project_1
description: Used if more than one project levels are allowed in the project hierarchy.

name: project
description: Project name.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom labels set in projects.json file to ease filtering.

name: result
description: String representing the result of the job, e.g. SUCCESS or FAILURE.

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: testproject
description: Name of test project extracted from job name.

name: url
description: Build's URL

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.
